Text: Audio and video quality very good. Screen resolution 720*400. There may be quality loss when streamed to a larger television. Thank you uploader.
Its an MP4 and wont run on my DVD player, but works just fine on my PDA, so thanks neways :)

Holocowboy: A great way to help with jthis is to download 'Prism Video File Converter' and convert the file from MP4 to .avi and this will allow for it to work on all dvd players and portable dvd players
